sub-events.comment: Disable color replace shader by default
Enable color replace shader if you have the Heat Suit
Direction (separated from the movement like in GnG)

Shoot (Instead of shooting a bullet here, I set the Player's "shoot" boolean to true and have that shoot the bullet. This allows the player to exit the spin jump or other states before shooting, ensuring the bullet is created at the proper image point.) (See: Player Shoot Group)
Check if player is on ground

Animations are continuously played from the current frame so the player can change aiming directions without resetting the animation. However, when switching to a new animation, I set the frame to 0 as to not start from the previous animation's frame. The idle animation works this way too. However, if the player is going from Run to Idle then I wait until the frame has changed to prevent that instant "pop" to the idle animation when you stop moving. It just looks better.
Hurt the player when touching an enemy
Hurt the player when touching an enemy projectile
